title: Palindrome Checker
statement:
# Palindrome Checker

Write a program that checks if a given string is a palindrome.

## Problem Description

A palindrome is a string that reads the same forwards and backwards. Check if the input string is a palindrome (case-insensitive, ignore spaces).

## Input Format

A single line containing a string.

## Output Format

Print `YES` if the string is a palindrome, `NO` otherwise.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ length ≤ 1000
- String contains only letters and spaces
